dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: What do you say we have a drink together? It’ll warm you right up~

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: You’re an early riser, I see~ A little laziness wouldn’t hurt, you know?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: A cup of tea is a must-have after a greasy meal~ So, would you care for some?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Will you retire for the night? Oh my… That outfit sure doesn’t look to be comfortable sleepwear… I’ll have to lend you one of my silk garments~

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: What I do at my job is mostly the same as my usual training… Yet I can’t help but feel fatigued when it is work.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
I don’t particularly care for physical work. I only feel like it from time to time… Brewing tea is much more fun.
Back home, many occasions needed me to get moving whether I wanted it or not… Haha!

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
How to make a fire...? The key is not to question how.
There was no use wondering about things like that, I'm telling you~

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
You’re taking an interest in my tea leaves? Why sure, I can teach you~
Ah… I should mention that the tea sets and brews I have can be quite expensive… Um, are you alright?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
If you’re interested in practicing our martial arts, I could help~
In fact, I’ve instructed a couple of my coworkers from Section 6, too~ I’m sure I’ll be a good teacher!

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Hmm… What a lovely scent the sun’s rays exude~

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: I see~ I was starting to wonder when you’d bring this up~

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: With warmth—sometimes heat.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: It’s time to flare up, isn’t it?

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Is there anything you want to say?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: With grace!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Their balance is broken!

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Oh dear…

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: It burns bright!

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Well, I… really could use… a warm cup… of tea.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I followed a nice scent.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: No wonder the flavor was unpleasant…

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Hm~ That gave me good exercise.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Oh my~ I guess I got a little more excited than I expected. Ahahah…

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Come now, let’s move somewhere else for tea. These things just happen sometimes, no?
